titles.title: Developing the National Security Workforce Act of 2019
Developing the National Security Workforce Act of 2019

A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense to develop workforce development investment incentives and to consider a qualified training program of an offeror as part of the past performance rating of such offeror, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Developing the National Security Workforce Act of 2019
This bill requires the Department of Defense to develop incentives for a contractor to implement a qualified training program to enhance the workforce of the defense industrial base, as well as standards for such incentives.
